Name: FINSummerVR
About the game: Experience the Finnish midsummer in Virtual Reality! Play as a grumpy old man from the village of Perälä in the middle of northern wilderness. Play summer games, heat up your sauna and build up a bonfire in this humorous parody of the Finnish lifestyle. Features: * Fully interactable cottage and sauna * Traditional Finnish yard games * Finnish voice acting with English subtitles * Other funny stuff
